resources.string: Serenity needs access to your storage to allow you to attach photos and videos. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Photos and videos on
Serenity needs access to your microphone to allow voice recordings. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone on
Serenity needs access to your camera to take photos. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on
Serenity needs access to your location to add places to your notes. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Location on
